prejob.description: I create minimalist and elegant websites, with meticulous attention to detail. Passionate about development, I strive to design impactful and captivating experiences through each of my designs. My goal is to maximize the visual and functional impact of each project while maintaining refined simplicity.

project_home_1.name: Beady-Ink
project_home_1.subtitle: arnzefnzeokgnekg gkezngzeng en kgzeog ze ngzeok gzeo g  no ezgknoz n
project_home_1.description_pt1: Development of an interactive showcase site and a tailor-made web application to present the client's artistic creations (tattoos and nails).
project_home_1.description_pt2: Users can browse a dynamic gallery, create an account, book an appointment online and leave reviews.
project_home_1.description_pt3: An intuitive dashboard has been designed to allow the customer to manage her activity: adding photos and services, managing schedules and appointments, monitoring customer reviews. The site is fully responsive and designed for easy use, even without technical skills.

project_home_2.name: Devoteam
project_home_2.subtitle: arnzefnzeokgnekg gkezngzeng en kgzeog ze ngzeok gzeo g  no ezgknoz n
project_home_2.description_pt1: I developed an interactive dashboard to visualize and analyze attrition trends in the Devoteam company, supervised by a doctoral student.
project_home_2.description_pt2: Using randomized data, I designed dynamic graphs to identify precise correlations (seniority, departments, types of contracts).
project_home_2.description_pt3: The project includes the creation of models on Figma and development with React (front-end) and Node.js (back-end). This work strengthened my skills in data visualization, web development, and complex project management.

preservice.info: What you can expect from me:
preservice.description: I create minimalist and elegant websites, with meticulous attention to detail. Passionate about development, I strive to design impactful and captivating experiences through each of my designs. My goal is to maximize visual impact and functionality of each project, while maintaining a refined simplicity.

service_1.subtitle: I specialize in creating websites that are not only responsive and optimized for SEO but also designed for exceptional performance and speed. My dynamic solutions ensure that your site remains stable and functional.

service_2.subtitle: I develop modern, high-performance web applications that combine responsiveness, speed, and stability. My goal is to ensure a smooth user experience through dynamic and scalable solutions.
service_2.info_5: Advanced functionality (appointment booking, dynamic content, registration, connection or other)
service_2.info_6: Secure connection (Authentication and management of user profiles)

service_3.subtitle: Une solution sur mesure pour vos besoins avancés
service_3.info_1: Online store creation (An intuitive platform to present and sell your products or services.)
service_3.info_2: Secure payment solutions (Integration of Stripe, PayPal, or other gateways.)
service_3.info_5: Advanced functionality (appointment booking, dynamic content, registration, connection or other)
service_3.info_6: Optimized UX/UI design Smooth navigation and attractive design to offer your customers an optimal user experience.

site_vitrine.subtitle: I develop modern, efficient and optimized web applications, combining responsiveness, speed and stability. My goal is to ensure a smooth user experience through dynamic and scalable solutions.

application_web.subtitle: I develop modern, efficient and optimized web applications, combining responsiveness, speed and stability. My goal is to ensure a smooth user experience through dynamic and scalable solutions.

best_project.description: My projects showcase the work I have done. Take a look at my portfolio, highlighting the diversity of my web design and application development projects.
best_project.project_1_description: Discover Beaudy Ink, a professional tattoo and nail salon in Soye-en-Septaine and Flavigny, offering unique and artistic designs.
best_project.project_2_description: As part of my internship, alongside a PhD student, I was able to create an interactive dashboard aimed at reducing the attrition rate within Devoteam.
project_2_fonctionnalitées: Filter by Country, Age Group, Gender, Date Range
best_project.project_3_description: Immersive storytelling experiences using augmented reality. Blending technology and storytelling for unforgettable journeys that captivate and engage audiences.

approach.echange: First exchange with the client to understand their needs, goals, and measurement requirements.
approach.benchmark: Benchmarking competitors and the industry. Creating a wireframe to define the structure. Presentation and client feedback.
approach.design: Creating the final design (UI) based on the validated wireframe. Feedback and adjustments with the client.
approach.integration: Integration and development of the site or application.
approach.validation: Going live with the final product after validation.
approach.evolutions: Possibility of updates and evolutions according to client needs.
approach.title: My approach to your project

about.title: About — I am Paul, a freelance web developer dedicated to helping businesses unlock their growth potential.
about.subtitle_1: Since my high school years, I have been passionate about web development, and today, I specialize in creating custom web experiences tailored to the needs of each client. What drives me is providing the best digital solutions to businesses by combining creativity and technical expertise.
about.subtitle_2: Since I started my freelance activity three months ago, I have had the opportunity to collaborate with two professional clients, assisting them in realizing their digital projects. My goal is to help businesses achieve their ambitions through personalized and effective solutions. Through each project, I strive to exceed expectations and create a lasting impact.

service_page.title: Services - Custom website design in React/Next.js, with tailored solutions. I transform your ideas into high-performing and engaging digital experiences.
service_page.subtitle: I transform your ideas into captivating, high-performing, and intuitive digital experiences designed to engage your audience and grow your business. My approach combines creativity and technical expertise to ensure a website that is both aesthetically pleasing and perfectly functional. The goal: to provide an optimal user experience, strengthen your online presence, and help you achieve your strategic ambitions. Let's create something exceptional together!
service_page.subtitle_1_pt_1: I offer custom Webflow development solutions for startups and creative/digital agencies from various industries, providing a seamless and efficient way to bring your vision to life. With Webflow, I can create a highly customized website that reflects the unique needs and goals of your business.
service_page.subtitle_1_pt_2: With a focus on user experience, responsive design, and optimal performance, your Webflow website will be designed to drive growth and success for your business. So why settle for a generic template when you can have a bespoke and creative Webflow website that truly sets you apart from the competition?
service_page.subtitle_2_pt_1: I offer custom Webflow development solutions for startups and creative/digital agencies from various industries, providing a seamless and efficient way to bring your vision to life. With Webflow, I can create a highly customized website that reflects the unique needs and goals of your business.
service_page.subtitle_2_pt_2: With a focus on user experience, responsive design, and optimal performance, your Webflow website will be designed to drive growth and success for your business. So why settle for a generic template when you can have a bespoke and creative Webflow website that truly sets you apart from the competition?
